duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet patients, sign them in, schedule future appointments, and handle incoming phone calls.
Assist patients in accordance with the training received ensuring patients receive the best service.
Handle insurance plans, process payments, and review posting audits.
Acknowledge, smile and greet patients upon arrival/dismissal.
Answer patient questions and concerns according to DCA Policies.
Scheduling appointments and maintaining the appointment book.
Confirming appointments and following up on no shows/cancellations.
Register patients on the sign-in sheet and post charges and payments to patient accounts.
Maintain a clean and friendly waiting area for patients.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2+ years of experience working in a dental health-care office
